entry.title: Saturday: Light snow. High minus 18.
entry.summary: Light snow ending early this morning then a mix of sun and cloud. Wind northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40. High minus 18. Wind chill minus 39 this morning and minus 28 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 AM CDT Saturday 1 April 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 25.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Wind north 20 km/h. Low minus 25. Wind chill minus 30 this evening and minus 37 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 AM CDT Saturday 1 April 2023
